title: Vinaa Vinaa Song Lyrics Papanasam
stanzas:
Vinaa Vinaa Song Lyrics Papanasam
#Ghibran #Hariharan #Papanasam 

vina vina orey vina
vidaamaley ezhum vina
Nirai vuraa orey kanna
iraivanna manithanaa

aattril sellum neeril
netrin vellam yaethu
netrellam maayaiye

soorai kaatrin oodaai
saayaa naanar kaadaai
vendum or menmaiye

boobaalam ketkaatho
aahayam nam dheepam
aahatho

vina vina orey vina
vidaamaley ezhum vina

sikkumaa sikkumaa silanthi 
thaan amaitha  than valayil.
sikkuthae sikkuthe manathu 
paavam enum poi valayil.

ammai appan kaakkum pillai 
aayul nooru vaazhum
immai seitha nanmai nanmai 
theemai kondru kaakkum.

anbe, uyariyaa avanam 
seitha aram nammai kaathidum

vina vina orey vina
vidaamaley ezhum vina
Nirai vuraa orey kanna
iraivanna manithanaa

kathiyaa buthiya irandil 
velvathedhu sol manamey
buthiye buthiye ulagil 
velkindra ayuthamae.

paarai meley thaerai ponaal 
paatha suvadu illaye
vaerai polae unmai kooda 
veliyae vanthaal thollauye
kooraa manamey ragasiyam
Ulagil urave avasiam

vina vina orey vina
vidaamaley ezhum vina
Nirai vuraa orey kanna
iraivanna manithanaa

aattril sellum neeril
netrin vellam yaethu
netrellam maayaiye

soorai kaatrin oodaai
saayaa naanar kaadaai
vendum or menmaiye

boobaalam ketkaatho
aahayam nam dheepam
aahatho

seo.title: Vinaa Vinaa Song Lyrics Papanasam
seo.description: Get the complete Vinaa Vinaa Song Lyrics Papanasam from Papanasam. Read the lyrics penned by Na Muthukumar and composed by M Ghibran and sung by Hariharan. Perfect for fans looking for the full Tamil text and song meaning.
seo.keywords: Na Muthukumar, Papanasam, M Ghibran, Hariharan, Tamil lyrics, Tamil songs
